title: Shooting Michael Moore Film Documentary
description:
Shooting Michael Moore reveals another side of Moore.

We learn that while writing books and shooting films that expose America's inequities and presenting himself as a moral compass, he abused the non-profit status, engaged in questionable tax practices, violated environmental laws, and invested in Halliburton, oil stocks, leading drug companies, and HMO-chains.

Additionally, contrary to his public persona, he used and deceived both the "little people" as well as U.S servicemen, and Flint's populace is still waiting for him to bring promised jobs.
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1323581/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1323581/</a>

This torrent contains two formats of the video. One is an ISO, and the other is an MP4 which I ripped using DVDFab v9.1.4.2. Choose the one you want, or both, through your torrent client.
